Class BasicRelationship

java.lang.Object
at.tugraz.ist.ase.fm.core.Relationship
at.tugraz.ist.ase.fm.core.BasicRelationship
public class BasicRelationship extends Relationship
Represents one of the following relationships/constraints: + Mandatory + Optional + Or + Alternative + Requires + Excludes
